meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peter Karamitsos Allison Berke Zach Dark Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7718.

td.p: Peter Karamitsos, a software salesman from Elmhurst, Illinois
Allison Berke, a cybersecurity research director from Half Moon Bay, California
Zach Dark, an investment analyst from Hoover, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,201)

tr.td: HISTORICAL NICKNAMES
ENDS WITH "SS"
THE TV SHOW'S PRESIDENTIAL TICKET
PERFECT RESPONSES FOR JEOPARDY!
(Alex: Because they are already questions.)
WHAT A HIGH-CLASS MISTAKE!
HOLD MY WINE

(Alex: No, you\'re repeating "what is". You don\'t have to. You could just say [*] and I would accept that as correct.)

"Why can\'t I?"

Allison
')
